title: Devil May Cry
synopsis: Devil May Cry follows the story of the demon hunter known as Dante. As a half demon, half human, he uses his trusty sword Rebellion and his two guns Ebony and Ivory to take on missions. Dante owns and runs "Devil May Cry," a business that specializes in hunting and killing demon-related problems.
voices: ['Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Fukuen, Misato', 'Orikasa, Fumiko', 'Tanaka, Atsuko', 'Miki, Shinichiro', 'Ootsuka, Akio', 'Park, Romi', 'Nojima, Hirofumi', 'Nozawa, Nachi']
